src/lib/components/SuggestionsInput.reac.description:
An `<input>`/<textarea> with associated triggers that will display a menu
with suggestions.

className.description: CSS class for the container of the input and suggestions modal.

style.description: Style object given to the container of the input and suggestions modal.

trigger.name: string
trigger.description:
Activate these suggestions when the trigger is entered in the
input value.

suggestion_route.name: string
suggestion_route.description:
Call this route to retrieve the options
It needs to return a json array of options shape.

options.name: arrayOf
options.description: The options this suggestion trigger will display.

suggestions.description:
Suggestions array containing the options to show
when a trigger is activated.

allow_space_in_suggestions.description:
Continue capturing the input when a space is entered while
the suggestion menu is open.

include_trigger.description: Include the trigger in the rendered value.

suggestions_style.description: Given and merged with the default style to the suggestions modal.

suggestion_style.description: Style of the suggestion elements (single suggestion).

suggestion_className.description: CSS class for a single suggestion element.

suggestion_selected_style.description: Style of a suggestion while it is selected.

suggestion_selected_className.description: CSS class for a suggestion while it is selected.

captured.description: Readonly prop containing the typed string since the last trigger. (READONLY)

filtered_options.description:
Currently displayed suggestions. Update in a callback to set the currently displayed suggestions.

@example
```
app.callback(Output('suggestions', 'filtered_options'),
             [Input('suggestions', 'captured')],
             [State('suggestions', 'current_trigger')]
```

fuzzy.description:
If true match all options containing the captured input
else match suggestions from the start of the line.

src/lib/components/TableOfContents.react.description: Build a table of contents list with links to the headers tag.

className.description: className for the top ul component.

content_selector.description: Selector to search for building the toc.

headings.description:
Headings tag name to search.
The table of contents will be leveled according to the order of
the headings prop.

refId.name: string
refId.description: The id to reference on the page. (scroll to)

table_of_contents.description: The table of content in object form.
